meanings.definition: The holding of an office or position.
meanings.sent1: Her incumbency as the team captain was marked by strong leadership.
meanings.sent2: During his incumbency as mayor, the city saw significant growth.
meanings.sent3: The cat's incumbency as the ruler of the house meant endless treats and belly rubs.
meanings.sent4: The tree's incumbency as the tallest in the forest made it a beacon for lost travelers.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's incumbency as the class monitor ensured order and discipline.

meanings.definition: The period during which one holds an office or position.
meanings.sent1: The senator's long incumbency allowed him to make lasting changes in legislation.
meanings.sent2: It was a challenging time during her incumbency as CEO of the company.
meanings.sent3: The dog's incumbency as the guard of the house involved lots of napping and barking.
meanings.sent4: The mountain's incumbency as a symbol of strength and endurance inspired many climbers.
meanings.sent5: The queen's incumbency brought prosperity and peace to the kingdom.
